nodes.text: Indoumodo was a jungle planet located in the galaxy's Wild Space region. Venomous insects known as kouhuns were native to the world's swamps, where they hunted prey as large as dogs. Assassins would capture the indoumodo to add to their arsenal. The planet's northern hemisphere comprised forests known for their hanava trees and large populations of greddleback termites.

Indoumodo was first mentioned in Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Visual Dictionary, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by David West Reynolds that was released on April 22, 2002. It became canon when it was mentioned in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book cowritten by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham that was released on April 28, 2015.
